userStories.title: Criar wf-1-full-launch.yaml
userStories.description: Workflow Full Product Launch (5-7 days) com 6 fases: Foundation (Day 1), Strategy (Day 2), Execution (Day 3-4), Email Sequences (Day 5), Optimization (Day 6-7)
userStories.notes: PHASE 2: Workflows - Criado com 5 fases, 15 tasks, 6-7 dias. PHASE-1 Foundation (Day 1): Hopkins scientific testing + Schwartz awareness diagnosis + Collier mental conversation. PHASE-2 Strategy (Day 2): Kennedy 3Ms avatar + Todd Brown unique mechanism + Georgi RMBC. PHASE-3 Execution (Days 3-4): Multi-clone headlines (Halbert/Carlton/Ogilvy) + VSL (Benson) OR Sales Letter (Halbert) + Bencivenga/Lampropoulos bullets + Makepeace emotional amplification. PHASE-4 Email (Day 5): Chaperon SOS 5-email + Sugarman cart abandonment 4-email + Settle post-purchase (optional). PHASE-5 Optimization (Days 6-7): Hopkins audit + Sugarman trigger injection + Final QC. Checkpoints com human_review configurável. 16 agentes referenciados, 14 tasks utilizados. 480 linhas, YAML válido, todas referências validadas.
acceptanceCriteria: Day 1: Hopkins setup, Schwartz awareness, Collier mental conversation
Day 2: Kennedy 3Ms, Todd Brown mechanism, Georgi RMBC
Day 3-4: Headlines (multi-clone), VSL (Benson) or Sales Letter (Halbert), Bullets (Bencivenga + Lampropoulos), Emotion (Makepeace)
Day 5: Chaperon SOS, Sugarman cart sequence
Day 6-7: Hopkins audit, Sugarman triggers, Final QC

userStories.title: Criar wf-6-funnel-optimization.yaml

userStories.notes: PHASE 2: Workflows - Criado com 577 linhas.
